name: Preacher's Kid
description: Tired of being a Preacher's daughter and longing to experience more of life, 20-something ANGIE KING strikes out on her own for the very first time and joins a traveling gospel show.

review.author: young-erika65
review.heading: Definitely deserve a 10
review.reviewBody: Latoya Lockett Was the perfect person to play in this movie. She is so beautiful and kind. May God bless her to continue success!!! Latoya Lockett is definitely HOUSTON finest. After Destiny's Child. Latoya Luckett is truly an inspiration. Getting a Role of Greenleafown brought her to new Unstoppable fierce ðŸ”¥ heights. I am so Proud of Latoya Luckett who has a testimony!!! Preachers Kid was and Still is one of my favorite Movies. Netflix needs to pick this movie up now!
